eng: They rarely write SMS. — Do they?
You often drink wine. — Do I?
They often do the same. — Do they?
tr: Они часто делают то же самое. — Действительно*?

eng: He often swims here. — Does he?
The food is not very good.
help: ðə fud ɪz nɑt ˈvɛri ɡʊd.

eng: I don't understand why the food's late.
tr: Я не понимаю, почему еда опоздала.
